arts.ttl: Lille vs PSG – Parisian lineup announced, Kvaratskhelia ready?
arts.sum: This Sunday, Paris Saint-Germain (1st) faces Lille (6th) at the Stade Pierre Mauroy in Matchday 7 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 (kick-off at 8:45 p.m., CET). This Friday, Le Parisien suggested a likely Parisian team, specifying that Khvicha Kvaratskhelia (24-year-old striker) could be in the squad. Barcola – Ramos or Ndjantou – Lee Mayulu – […]

arts.ttl: Lille vs PSG – Luis Enrique’s press conference live this Saturday
arts.sum: This Sunday at 8:45 PM (CET), Paris Saint-Germain (1st place) will face Lille (6th place) at the Stade Pierre Mauroy during the 7th matchday of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season. Ahead of the match, Paris Saint-Germain’s coach, Luis Enrique, will hold a press conference at 1 PM. You can watch the press conference live here […]

arts.ttl: Lille vs PSG – The referee for the 7th day’s match has been appointed, his statistics
arts.sum: This Sunday, as part of Matchday 7 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season, first-place Paris Saint-Germain will face eighth-place Lille at the Stade Pierre Mauroy (kick-off at 8:45 p.m., CET). The referee for the match has been chosen: Benoît Bastien (42 years old). He has extensive experience in Ligue 1, having played 261 matches. The […]
